room_title: Escape room "Classroom Capers" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: A great Classroom Capers experience! It was challenging and we had so much fun trying to escape. We "failed" but loved the challenge on our adult date-night outing! Now we plan on doing it on a regular basis with even more friends/couples!

room_title: Escape room "Classroom Capers" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: So much fun! We did the Classroom Capers and beat it! We can't wait to go back and do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Classroom Capers" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: Did the Classroom for a friend's birthday. Made it out and had a blast. Very cool escape room with unique puzzles and mechanisms. Looking forward to trying their new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Classroom Capers" by Escape Now Houston in Houston
review: We had so much fun. We went as a big group and we were able to work together to figure out the clues and escape the room with a minute and a half to spare.
